BEVEL BLADES

Stainless steel blades with a graphite coating that reduces friction and prolongs blade life.

BEVEL DIAL LED DISPLAY

All-new LED Smart Display delivers precise gap adjustments from 0.0-2.5mm in 0.1mm increments.

BEVEL PIVOT LOCK MAGNETIC GUARDS

Powerful neodymium magnets keep the guards on securely during use. Includes #0, #1, #2, #3, and #4 guards.

BEVEL POWER FADE GAP CONTROL

More precise cuts happen with our advanced leverless gap adjustments. Our powered gap adjustment system opens and closes the blade at the touch of a button.

BEVEL SNAP LOCK MODULARITY

More precise cuts happen with our advanced leverless gap adjustments. Our powered gap adjustment system opens and closes the blade at the touch of a button.

CONSISTENT, CORDLESS POWER

Rechargeable battery for up to 50 minutes of cordless power. 5-minute quick charge for one full shave.
